name: SUPERSONIC
description:
Compete in futuristic races! Dodge obstacles on supersonic speeds! Use your skill and reaction to overtake opponents!

Racing game set in a sci-fi world, where every player can feel the rush of racing of the future. Multiple tracks provide uneasy challenge, AI opponents will require maximum concentration, since every single one of them will do everything to get to the finish line first. Each race is configurable: difficulty, lap and bot count.

How to play:

Press W to gain speed.

A,D - roll left and right.

Hold Spacebar, to use supersonic booster. It's value is displayed in the lower center part of the user interface. You can gain booster by picking it up on the yellow platforms.

Music by TeknoAxe
